posts.description:
There has been a juicy, Grade A, prime USDA, holy sh*tload amount of hate on my page over the past few days ğŸ™ˆ Honestly, youâ€™d think I tattooed a swastika on my forehead. Let me catch you up to speed: the good news is Iâ€™m not a racist or anti-semite. The bad news is Iâ€™m much, much worse than that. I openly dared to say that I put cheese on my pizza. I eat the occasional hamburger. Thatâ€™s rightâ€” I am not vegan ğŸ˜± Someone told me I must â€œlike the raping of cows,â€ someone else said I was a disgrace to yoga, and countless people messaged me to tell me what an repulsive person I am. ğŸ”¹ğŸ”¹ğŸ”¹
Now, I feel itâ€™s also important to note that Iâ€™m not aggressively carnivorous. I mean, I like salads. I buy organic non-GMO everything, and the meat we buy is minimal and humanely raised. Iâ€™m 100% happy with all the veggie friends we have in the #badyogi community AND Iâ€™ve even made changes to my own life based on their conscientious feedback & anecdotes. We all live harmoniously around here because we all actually LIKE each other! Itâ€™s awesome. ğŸ”¹ğŸ”¹ğŸ”¹
So to anyone who chooses to freely berate others for what they put on their plate, let me just tell you: YOU are whatâ€™s wrong with the yoga community. YOU are the problem. You are contributing to the exclusivity that scares people away from doing something good for themselves. You give your fellow vegans & activists a bad image. Itâ€™s easy to cherry-pick where our self-righteousness gets placed. Sure, you may be vegan, but have you ever shopped at H&M or Walmart? Have you ever in your life had a cup of NON-fair trade, NON-organic coffee or tea? Whose hands made the cell phone youâ€™re using to troll my Instagram? Before you hit â€œsendâ€ on a nasty comment aimed at cutting someone down because their life looks different from yours, take a step back and at least realize the irony. We can all be agents for change, but you might consider putting down the pitchforks if you want to get your message across. Peace!âœŒï¸#badyogisunite
Don't worry about what I'm doing. Worry about why you're worried about what I'm doing ğŸ˜˜ #badyogi #pizza #butalsosalad #badyogisunite #allyogisarerealyogis

This goes way beyond what we eat. Where does your self-worth come from? When we attach our self-worth to little adjectives ABOUT ourselves instead of by WHO WE ARE without any adjectives, we can easily fall into patterns of judgment when we meet people who donâ€™t align with our own beliefs. ğŸ”¹
Iâ€™ll say it again: There is no prerequisite for you to be accepted here. I donâ€™t care if youâ€™re a vegan or a meat-eater. I donâ€™t care if youâ€™re kind of an asshole sometimes (arenâ€™t we all?ğŸ˜œ). Itâ€™s fine if you smoke (but for your health Iâ€™d IMPLORE you to quit ğŸ™). I donâ€™t care if you hated the Gilmore Girls and I donâ€™t care if you love Trump. I mean, The Frenchman hates FRIENDS but we make it work somehow ğŸ˜‰ ğŸ”¹
All of that is irrelevant to your worth as a human to me. Here, you are welcome. You are enough exactly as you are. The only â€œruleâ€ I have is that I need you to understand that this is MY HOUSE. And in my house we donâ€™t disrespect each other. Discord & thoughtful disagreements are OK, but hatefulness & judgment are not. This is a safe haven, a sanctuary from the rest of the world that already expects us to be so many things according to whatever is â€œperfectâ€ that week. At #badyogi you donâ€™t have to prove to us that youâ€™re worthy of being here. Itâ€™s already done. You have a voice worth listening to. We care about what you have to say. You are seen. You are heard. You are enough. \\ end rant

This picture makes me look way cooler than I actually am. In one of my workshops I taught last month, we talked a lot about how we perceive ourselves versus how others perceive us. What do you believe about yourself that no one else would? Is it a good thing or bad thing? 
#badyogi #badyogisunite #foodforthought

Sometimes you just need to fit it in wherever you can! Even 1-minute is better than nothing, so here's a little #officeyoga inspiration for anyone heading into work this morning ğŸ’ª Double pigeon in your desk chair goes a LONG way for tight hips and an achy lower back! #badyogi #badyogisunite #yogainspiration

Tell me I'm not the only one who does this: Do you ever see pictures of yourself and think, "holy shit, I'm an adult?!" Like, we are GROWN UPS?! 99% of the stuff in my house and in my fridge is there because I bought it. I make dentist appointments and host Thanksgivings. We have a CPA. I feel like the only adult "things" more adult than those are having a pool and having kids ğŸ˜† ...neither of which I'm eager to acquire. And that's the end of my weird little sidetrack about adulting. And I don't think being an adult sucks. Being an adult is freaking awesome. #badyogi #badyogisunite
